Title: jFluent
Description: jFluent is a Fluent style, light-weight validation framework for client-side validation.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
jFluent is a Fluent style, light-weight validation framework for client-side validation.

jFluent - Fluent Style jQuery Validation Plugin

jFluent is a jQuery plugin that can be used in ASP .NET MVC and also in standard (or mobile) HTML websites.
